title: rec
description: A JARM hash sample taken from a server.

fqdn.description: The domain associated with the whois record.

asof.description: The date of the whois record.

text.description: The full text of the whois record.

created.description: The "created" time from the whois record.

updated.description: The "last updated" time from the whois record.

expires.description: The "expires" time from the whois record.

registrar.description: The registrar name from the whois record.

registrant.description: The registrant name from the whois record.
